column1: CARD.  1. CARD ONE
DECK.  189. SURVEY NUMBER
BALLOT.  X. BALLOT NUMBER GENERATED BY ROPER CENTER.
Q.1. HOW LONG HAVE YOU BEEN OVERSEAS*  1. 3 MONTHS OR LESS 2. OVER 3 MONTHS UP TO 6 MONTHS 3. OVER 6 MONTHS UP TO 1 YEAR 4. OVER 1 YEAR UP TO 2 YEARS 5. OVER TWO YEARS 0. NO ANSWER
Q.2. IN GENERAL, HOW OFTEN WOULD YOU SAY YOU HAVE LISTENED TO THE RADIO DURING THE PAST FOUR WEEKS*  1. VERY OFTEN 2. OFTEN 3. ONCE IN A WHILE 4. SELDOM OR NEVER 5. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

Q.3. DURING THE PAST FOUR WEEKS, HOW MUCH OF THE TIME YOU HAVE SPENT LISTENING TO THE RADIO WAS SPENT LISTENING TO THE ALLIED EXPEDITIONARY FORCES PROGRAMS*  1. ALMOST ALL OF THE TIME 2. MOST OF THE TIME 3. SOME OF THE TIME 4. NONE OF THE TIME 5. NOT SURE 0. NO ANSWER

Q.4. IF YOU HAVE LISTENED TO THE ALLIED EXPEDITIONARY FORCES PROGRAMS AT ANY TIME SINCE YOU,VE BEEN ON THE CONTINENT, IS THERE ANYTHING ABOUT THE KIND OF BROADCASTS, OR ABOUT THE WAY THEY ARE PRESENTED, THAT YOU PARTICULARLY LIKE*  1. I HAVEN,T LISTENED TO THE ALLIED EXPEDITIONARY FORCES PROGRAMS 2. NO, NOTHING I PARTICULARLY LIKE 3. YES - I PARTICULARLY LIKE (SOMETHING WRITTEN IN) 4. YES, NOTHING WRITTEN IN 0. NO ANSWER

Q.8A. IN GENERAL DO YOU LIKE OR DISLIKE THE WAY THE NEWS IS PRESENTED*  1. LIKE IT VERY MUCH 2. LIKE IT FAIRLY WELL 3. DON,T PARTICULARLY LIKE OR DISLIKE IT 4. DISLIKE IT PRETTY MUCH 5. DISLIKE IT VERY MUCH 0. NO ANSWER

Q.9. IN GENERAL, DO YOU FEEL THAT THE PRESENT JOINT BROADCASTING SERIVCE WHICH IS DESIGNED FOR ALL ENGLISH SPEAKING ALLIED TROOPS IN THE THEATER IS BEST, OR DO YOU FEEL THAT EACH OF THE ALLIES SHOULD HAVE A SEPARATE SERVICE BROADCASTING THEIR OWN PROGRAMS PRINCIPALLY TO THEIR OWN TROOPS*  1. FEEL THAT THE PRESENT JOINT BROADCASTING SERVICE IS BEST 2. FEEL THAT EACH OF THE ALLIES SHOULD BROADCAST THEIR PROGRAMS PRINCIPALLY TO THEIR OWN TROOPS 3. FEEL IT DOESN,T MAKE MUCH DIFFERENCE HOW IT IS DONE 0. NO ANSWER
V.9A. OPINION ABOUT BROADCASTING SERVICE:  1. ANTI-BRITISH 2. PRO-AMERICAN 3. OTHER 4. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA
Q.10. WHAT BRANCH OF THE ARMY ARE YOU IN NOW*  1. FIELD ARTILLERY 2. QUARTERMASTER 3. INFANTRY 4. ARMORED COMMAND 5. AIR CORPS 6. TRANSPORTATION CORPS 7. ORDNANCE DEPARTMENT 8. OTHER 0. NO ANSWER

Q.11. HOW FAR DID YOU GO IN SCHOOL*  1. LESS THAN 6TH GRADE 2. FINISHED 6TH GRADE 3. FINISHED 7TH GRADE 4. FINISHED 8TH GRADE 5. SOME HIGH SCHOOL BUT DID NOT FINISH 6. GRADUATED FROM HIGH SCHOOL 7. SOME COLLEGE BUT DID NOT FINISH 8. GRADUATED FROM COLLEGE 0. NO ANSWER
Q.12. HAVE YOU BEEN IN ACTUAL COMBAT IN THIS WAR*  1. YES 2. NO 0. NO ANSWER
V.13. COMMENTS ON IMPROVING RADIO SERVICE:  1. PRO-AMERICAN COMMENTS 2. ANTI-BRITISH COMMENTS 3. OTHER 0. NO ANSWER
V.14. UNIT IDENTIFICATION: X. CODES NOT PROVIDED BY SURVEY ORGANIZATION. DATA TRANSFERRED AS IS.  ANP
